DOC.brief_summary: High rate recurrent cardiovascular event readmission percutaneous coronary intervention ( PCI ) important issue . Guidelines emphasize rehabilitation secondary prevention . But many patient lack effective management PCI.This study aim examine effect mobile application ( APP ) -based multifaceted management improvement long-term care PCI .
DOC.detailed_description: This cluster-randomized controlled trial evaluate effect APP-based multifaceted management strategy improvement long-term care medication adherence , risk factor control , reduction adverse event , readmission rate mortality PCI.It include knowledge education , medication reminder , advice provision , support change lifestyle behavior . The program interactive care provider patient . A total 20 ward randomly assign intervention usual care.Anticipated 1100 patient PCI participate trial . All participant follow 12 month .
